personal.title: Enterprise Technology
personal.bio: Enterprise IT leader focused on service delivery, endpoint modernization, automation, and security operations across multi-site environments. I build practical systems that scale—clean standards, reliable tooling, and user impact in mind.

projects.title: Island Gurus Digital Signage (Raspberry Pi Fleet)
projects.description: Managed digital signage for small businesses and multi-site orgs using Raspberry Pi players. Central content scheduling, remote monitoring, auto-recovery, and secure device hardening for reliable 24/7 playback.

projects.title: Last-Mile Air Fiber Links (Point-to-Point Wireless)
projects.description: Designed and deployed point-to-point wireless links for last-mile connectivity and site-to-site backhaul. Focus on line-of-sight surveys, throughput planning, weather resilience, and clean handoff to existing LAN/WAN gear.

projects.title: Small Business Network Refresh (Secure-by-Default)
projects.description: Standardized LAN/Wi-Fi builds with segmentation, guest networks, and clean firewall rules. Documentation-first installs with baselines that are maintainable for long-term MSP support.

projects.title: Managed Monitoring + Patch Workflow (RMM + Automation)
projects.description: Lightweight MSP operations stack: device onboarding, health monitoring, patch windows, and scripted remediation. Built to minimize business disruption while keeping endpoints current and supportable.

projects.title: On-Prem Mini-Stack (Edge Services for SMB)
projects.description: Affordable edge services for small sites: local file share, backups, and basic app hosting. Designed for simplicity, recoverability, and clear ownership boundaries.

projects.title: Remote Access & Secure Support Model
projects.description: Standard operating model for remote support: least-privilege access, MFA, and auditability. Designed to keep support fast without turning the environment into a security liability.

education.degree: Service Operations, Endpoint Management, Automation & Security
